menu-items.name: Classic Burger
menu-items.description: Thick and juicy 1/2 pound angus beef char-grilled burger.

menu-items.name: Reaper Burger
menu-items.description: Our SPICY thick and juicy 1/2 pound char-grilled burger served on a toasted bun with your choice of sides. This burger is NOT for the faint of heart. Served with an 8oz glass milk

menu-items.name: Mission Burger
menu-items.description: Cream Co. Organic Beef Brisket and Chuck 1/2 Pound Burger served on a warm bun with your choice of toppings.

menu-items.name: Southern Comfort
menu-items.description: Eastern Carolina-Style pulled pork served on a warm bun. Slaw served on the side.

menu-items.name: Grilled Chicken Burger
menu-items.description: Tender char-grilled chicken breast seasoned to perfection and served on a toasted bun with your choice of toppings.

menu-items.name: SuperFree Burger(vg/v)
menu-items.description: Our Vegan Burger: A patty made with sweet potatoes, roasted mushrooms, walnuts, and seeds. Add your choice of toppings

menu-items.name: Classic Vegan Burger
menu-items.description: Seasoned Impossible burger.

menu-items.name: PERi-PERi Wedges
menu-items.description: Freshly cut roasted potato wedges tossed in fresh garlic and house peri peri sauce.

menu-items.name: Fries
menu-items.description: Freshly made boardwalk-style fries, cut fresh and cooked twice. Firm on the outside and mashed potato on the inside.

menu-items.name: Cajun Fries
menu-items.description: Freshly made boardwalk-style fries showered with a heavy dose of Cajun spice. Cut fresh and cooked twice. Firm on the outside and mashed potato on the inside.

menu-items.name: Poutine
menu-items.description: Our Ode to Quebec: Freshly made boardwalk-style fries and cheese curds topped with house gravy.

menu-items.name: Onion Rings
menu-items.description: Our house beer-battered onion rings served with our signature house sauce.

menu-items.name: Garden Salad
menu-items.description: Our garden salad consists of crisp butter lettuce, leafy greens, sliced red onions, shredded carrots, cherry tomatoes, and croutons.

menu-items.name: Slaw
menu-items.description: Our southern-style coleslaw

menu-items.name: Sweet Tea
menu-items.description: Southern Style Sweet Tea

menu-items.name: Lagunitas IPNA
menu-items.description: Non-Alcoholic

menu-items.name: K's Sweet-n-Spicy Sauce (vg/v)
menu-items.description: Chef K's Sweet-n-Spicy Sauce. Warning, this sauce is H-O-T!

menu-items.name: Chipotle Ranch
menu-items.description: Our chipotle ranch dressing perfect for fries, onion rings, or on a burger!

menu-items.name: Horseradish Aioli
menu-items.description: Our medium-spiced horseradish aioli (fancy for mayo) perfect for fries, onion rings, or on a burger!

menu-items.name: Marzie's Way
menu-items.description: Lettuce, Tomato, Guacamole, and Chipotle Ranch Dressing

menu-items.name: Club Style
menu-items.description: Applewood Smoked Bacon, Butter Lettuce, Tomato, and Mayo

menu-items.name: Alley's Way
menu-items.description: Grilled Onions, Sautéed Mushrooms, and Jalapeños

menu-items.name: Secret Menu Item #1
menu-items.description: How did you get access to this! >:O Since you are here, try our Jucy Lucy! 1/2 pound angus beef burger stuffed with cheddar cheese and topped with grilled onoins and our secret sauce.

menu-items.name: Secret Menu Item #2
menu-items.description: You shouldn't be seeing this!! But since you are, have a Millionaire Burger. Seasonsed 1/2 pound angus beef burger topped with muesnster cheese and millionaire bacon.

menu-items.name: Secret Menu Item #3
menu-items.description: Our best kept secret...the Achyuth Special. A one pound seared lamb burger topped with butter lettuce, red onion, and our secret aioli.
